text: Baldur Preiml (8 July 1939 â€“ 27 January 2025) was a German-born Austrian ski jumper. He competed from 1960 to 1968. He won a bronze medal at the 1968 Winter Olympics in Grenoble. Preiml was born in Greifenburg, Nazi Germany. Preiml died in Spittal an der Drau, Austria on 27 January 2025, at the age of 85. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Austrian skiers Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Australia
title: Baldur Preiml
